title: Metal Gear Solid 4 HD Cutscenes (Un-archived)
description:
These are all the MGS4 cutscenes captured in 720p. There is no gameplay in these videos, aside from the Drebin chase, and Motorcycle chase, and ofcourse the final boss battle.

Credit goes to farisr of tehparadox.com for capturing and encoding these.

Original thread: http://tehparadox.com/forum/f76/official-metal-gear-solid-4-mgs4-hd-720p-cutscenes-thread-141945/

So if you want, join the community, and thank him.

Enjoy ;)
